name: MMAON
description: MMA is the world's fastest-growing sport with more than 500 million fans and growing rapidly. MMAON is creating the biggest and most exciting MMA fans network in the world. The future of Sports is in its digitalization. MMAON is becoming a global hub for MMA. Our vision is to put the power in the palms of the fans. MMAON will digitize the stadium and make combat sports more interactive and engaging for the fans. We bring the fan closer to the fighter, to the fight and to the sport - they become a true insider. Our innovative and customized features give the fan a unique experience.
